trans-unit.source: Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et isolert lagringsområde som inneholder filer og mapper.

trans-unit.source: This object corresponds to a specific isolated storage scope, where files represented by <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects exist.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet samsvarer med et bestemt isolert lagring omfang, der filer representert av <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>objektene finnes.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: Applications can use isolated storage to save data in their own isolated portion of the file system, without having to specify a particular path within the file system.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan bruke isolert lagring til å lagre data i sin egen isolert del av filsystemet, uten å angi en bestemt bane i filsystemet.

trans-unit.source: Since isolated stores are scoped to particular assemblies, most other managed code will not be able to access your code's data (highly trusted managed code and administration tools can access stores from other assemblies).
trans-unit.target: Siden isolerte butikker er begrenset til bestemte samlinger, de fleste forvaltet kode kan ikke kunne få tilgang til koden din data (svært klarert forvaltet kode og administrasjon verktøy kan få tilgang til butikker fra andre samlinger).

trans-unit.source: Unmanaged code can access any isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: Ubehandlet kode får tilgang til alle isolerte butikker.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen implementerer den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Når du er ferdig ved hjelp av typen, må du fjerne den direkte eller indirekte.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne av typen direkte, kan du kalle den <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>metoden i en `try` / `catch` block.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne den indirekte, bruke et språk som `using` (i C#) eller `Using` (i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, se "Ved hjelp av et objekt som implementerer IDisposable" i den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet emnet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Isolert lagring er ikke tilgjengelig for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apper.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files.
trans-unit.target: I stedet bruke programmet data klassene i den `Windows.Storage` navneområder inkludert i den [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] API for lagring lokale data og filer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [programdata](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) i Windows-utvikling Center.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the amount of free space available for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som representerer mengden ledig plass for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The available free space for isolated storage, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Ledig plass for isolerte lagring, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store is closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Closes a store previously opened with <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore*>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForAssembly*>, or <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain*>.
trans-unit.target: Lukker en butikk tidligere ble åpnet med <> </> *>, <> </> *>, eller <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain*>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain*>

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer en fil til en ny fil.

trans-unit.source: `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` must specify different file names.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`og `destinationFileName` må angi forskjellige filnavn.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.CopyFile%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload to overwrite an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.CopyFile%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden til å skrive over en eksisterende fil.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.CopyFile%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to copy.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på filen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The name of the destination file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på målfilen.

trans-unit.source: This cannot be a directory or an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være en katalog eller en eksisterende fil.

trans-unit.source: sourceFileName or destinationFileName is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters defined by the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: sourceFileName eller destinationFileName er en tom streng, inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn som er definert av den <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: sourceFileName or destinationFileName is .
trans-unit.target: sourceFileName or destinationFileName is .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: sourceFileName was not found.
trans-unit.target: sourceFileName Finner ikke.

trans-unit.source: sourceFileName was not found.
trans-unit.target: sourceFileName Finner ikke.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: -or- destinationFileName exists.
trans-unit.target: -or- destinationFileName exists.

trans-unit.source: -or- An I/O error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en i/u-feil.

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file, and optionally overwrites an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer en fil til en ny fil, og overskriver eventuelt en eksisterende fil.

trans-unit.source: `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` can have the same file name if `overwrite` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`og `destinationFileName` kan ha samme filnavn Hvis `overwrite` er `true`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to copy.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på filen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The name of the destination file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på målfilen.

trans-unit.source: This cannot be a directory.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være en mappe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the destination file can be overwritten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis målfilen kan overskrives; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: sourceFileName or destinationFileName is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters defined by the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: sourceFileName eller destinationFileName er en tom streng, inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn som er definert av den <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: Creates a directory in the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en mappe i omfanget for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The created directory initially contains no files.
trans-unit.target: Den opprettede mappen inneholder opprinnelig ingen filer.

trans-unit.source: If the directory already exists, the CreateDirectory method returns without creating a new directory.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mappen finnes allerede, returnerer metoden CreateDirectory uten å opprette en ny katalog.

trans-unit.source: The [How to: Create Files and Directories in Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) example demonstrates the use of the CreateDirectory method
trans-unit.target: Den [slik: opprette filer og mapper i isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksemplet viser bruk av metoden CreateDirectory

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the directory to create within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Relativ bane til mappen som skal opprette innenfor området isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The current code has insufficient permissions to create isolated storage directory.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende koden har ikke tilstrekkelige tillatelser til å opprette isolerte lagringskatalog.

trans-unit.source: The directory path is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mappebanen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a file in the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en fil i isolerte store.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilsvarer å bruke den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktør.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the file to create.
trans-unit.target: Relativ bane for filen som skal opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A new isolated storage file.
trans-unit.target: En ny isolerte lagringsfil.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: path is malformed.
trans-unit.target: pathhar feil format.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: The directory in path does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Mappen i path finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current size of the isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende størrelse på isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: Represents the total usage of all files and directories within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Representerer totalt bruken av alle filer og mapper i omfanget isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The current size cannot be accurately determined for stores that are participating in a roaming user profile.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende størrelse kan ikke fastslås nøyaktig for butikker som deltar i en sentral brukerprofil.

trans-unit.source: Because roaming profiles are often cached on multiple client machines and later synchronized with a server, quotas cannot be enforced for such stores and the current size is not reported.
trans-unit.target: Sentrale profiler er ofte bufret på flere klientmaskiner senere synkroniseres med en server og, og opp kan ikke brukes for slike butikker, og gjeldende størrelse er ikke rapportert.

trans-unit.source: The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) example demonstrates the use of the CurrentSize property.
trans-unit.target: Den [slik: forventer nok diskplass betingelser med isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksemplet viser bruk av egenskapen CurrentSize.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes of storage currently in use within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall byte for lagring Bruk som er i i området isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The property is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: The current store has a roaming scope or is not open.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende butikk har et sentrale område eller er ikke åpen.

trans-unit.source: The current object size is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende objekt-størrelsen er ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a directory in the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Sletter en mappe i omfanget for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: A directory must be empty before it is deleted.
trans-unit.target: En katalog må være tom før den slettes.

trans-unit.source: The deleted directory cannot be recovered once deleted.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke gjenopprette den slettede mappen slettes når.

trans-unit.source: The [How to: Delete Files and Directories in Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) example demonstrates the use of the DeleteDirectory method.
trans-unit.target: Den [slik: slette filer og mapper i isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksemplet viser bruk av metoden DeleteDirectory.

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the directory to delete within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Relativ bane til mappen som skal slettes i området isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The directory could not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke slette mappen.

trans-unit.source: The directory path was <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mappebanen ble <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a file in the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Sletter en fil i omfanget for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The deleted file cannot be recovered once deleted.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke gjenopprette filen slettet når slettes.

trans-unit.source: The [How to: Delete Files and Directories in Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) example demonstrates the use of the DeleteFile method.
trans-unit.target: Den [slik: slette filer og mapper i isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksemplet viser bruk av DeleteFile-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the file to delete within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Relativ bane for filen som skal slettes i området isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The target file is open or the path is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Målfilen er åpen eller banen er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: The file path is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Filbanen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified path refers to an existing directory in the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte banen refererer til en eksisterende mappe i isolerte store.

trans-unit.source: The path to test.
trans-unit.target: Banen til teste.

trans-unit.source: if path refers to an existing directory in the isolated store and is not ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis path refererer til en eksisterende mappe i isolerte store, og er ikke ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store is closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>.
trans-unit.target: Kall `Dispose` når du er ferdig med <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Den `Dispose` metoden forlater den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall `Dispose`, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>ble bruker.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressursene i <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>er bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før ugyldige samlingen kall av <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>objektets <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified path refers to an existing file in the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte banen refererer til en fil i isolerte store.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name to test.
trans-unit.target: Banen og filnavnet til å teste.

trans-unit.source: if path refers to an existing file in the isolated store and is not ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis path refererer til en fil i isolerte store, og er ikke ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store is closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Returns the creation date and time of a specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer opprettingsdatoen og klokkeslettet for en angitt fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: If the file described by path does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som er beskrevet i banen ikke finnes, returnerer denne metoden 12:00 midnatt, januar 1, 1601 e.kr.

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file or directory for which to obtain creation date and time information.
trans-unit.target: Banen til filen eller mappen å få informasjon for oppretting av dato og klokkeslett.

trans-unit.source: The creation date and time for the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Av opprettingsdatoen og klokkeslettet for den angitte filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er uttrykt i lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters defined by the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: path er en tom streng, inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn som er definert av den <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: path is .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the directories at the root of an isolated store.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer mapper på roten av et isolert lager.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetDirectoryNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method with "*" specified for the search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilsvarer å bruke den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetDirectoryNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>metode med "*" angitt for Søkemønsteret.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetDirectoryNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of relative paths of directories at the root of the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med relative baner av mapper på roten av isolerte lageret.

trans-unit.source: A zero-length array specifies that there are no directories at the root.
trans-unit.target: En tom matrise angir at det finnes ingen mapper i roten.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store is closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Caller does not have permission to enumerate directories.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke tillatelse til å liste opp mapper.

trans-unit.source: One or more directories are not found.
trans-unit.target: Fant ikke én eller flere kataloger.

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the directories in an isolated storage scope that match a given search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer mapper i en isolert lagring omfanget som samsvarer med en gitt Søkemønsteret.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Et mønster for søk.

trans-unit.source: Both single-character ("?") and multi-character ("*") wildcards are supported.
trans-unit.target: Begge ett tegn ("?") og flere tegn ("*") jokertegn støttes.

trans-unit.source: An array of the relative paths of directories in the isolated storage scope that match searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med relative baner mapper på isolert lagring område som samsvarer med searchPattern .

trans-unit.source: A zero-length array specifies that there are no directories that match.
trans-unit.target: En tom matrise angir at det finnes ingen mapper som samsvarer med.

trans-unit.source: searchPattern is .
trans-unit.target: searchPatternis .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store is closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Caller does not have permission to enumerate directories resolved from searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke tillatelse til å liste opp mapper løst fra searchPattern .

trans-unit.source: The directory or directories specified by searchPattern are not found.
trans-unit.target: Mappen eller mappene som er angitt av searchPattern som ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the enumerator for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"></xref> stores within an isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Henter opplistingen for den <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"> </xref> lagrer i et isolert lagring omfang.

trans-unit.source: The [How to: Enumerate Stores for Isolated Storage](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) example demonstrates the use of the GetEnumerator method.
trans-unit.target: Den [slik: liste butikker for isolert lagring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksemplet viser bruk av metoden GetEnumerator.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope"></xref> for which to return isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope"> </xref> som skal returneres isolerte butikker.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_User" name="User" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_User|Roaming" name="User|Roaming" href=""></xref> are the only <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsolatedStorageScope" name="IsolatedStorageScope" href=""></xref> combinations supported.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_User" name="User" href=""></xref>og <xref uid="langword_csharp_User|Roaming" name="User|Roaming" href=""> </xref> er de eneste <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsolatedStorageScope" name="IsolatedStorageScope" href=""> </xref> kombinasjoner støttes.

trans-unit.source: Enumerator for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"></xref> stores within the specified isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: Opplisting for den <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile"> </xref> lagres i det angitte isolerte lagring omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the file names at the root of an isolated store.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer filnavnene nederst i et isolert lager.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetFileNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method with "*" specified for the search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilsvarer å bruke den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetFileNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>metode med "*" angitt for Søkemønsteret.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetFileNames%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of relative paths of files at the root of the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med relative baner av filer på roten av isolerte lageret.

trans-unit.source: A zero-length array specifies that there are no files at the root.
trans-unit.target: En tom matrise angir at det er ingen filer i roten.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: File paths from the isolated store root cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: Filbaner fra isolerte lageret roten kan ikke fastsettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the file names that match a search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Henter filnavnene som tilsvarer et mønster for søk.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Et mønster for søk.

trans-unit.source: Both single-character ("?") and multi-character ("*") wildcards are supported.
trans-unit.target: Begge ett tegn ("?") og flere tegn ("*") jokertegn støttes.

trans-unit.source: An array of relative paths of files in the isolated storage scope that match searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med relative baner til filer i isolert lagring område som samsvarer med searchPattern .

trans-unit.source: A zero-length array specifies that there are no files that match.
trans-unit.target: En tom matrise angir at det er ingen filer som samsvarer med.

trans-unit.source: searchPattern is .
trans-unit.target: searchPatternis .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The file path specified by searchPattern cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte av filbanen searchPattern finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time a specified file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer datoen og klokkeslettet en angitt fil eller mappe sist ble åpnet.

trans-unit.source: If the file described by `path` does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen beskrevet av `path` finnes ikke, denne metoden returnerer 12:00 midnatt, januar 1, 1601 e.kr.

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file or directory for which to obtain last access date and time information.
trans-unit.target: Banen til filen eller mappen som skal få siste dato og klokkeslett tilgangsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the specified file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: Datoen og klokkeslettet som den angitte filen eller mappen sist ble åpnet.

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er uttrykt i lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters defined by the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: path er en tom streng, inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn som er definert av den <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: path is .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time a specified file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer datoen og klokkeslettet en angitt fil eller mappe sist ble skrevet til.

trans-unit.source: If the file described by `path` does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen beskrevet av `path` finnes ikke, denne metoden returnerer 12:00 midnatt, januar 1, 1601 e.kr.

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file or directory for which to obtain last write date and time information.
trans-unit.target: Banen til filen eller mappen som skal få siste skrive dato og klokkeslett informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the specified file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: Datoen og klokkeslettet da den angitte filen eller mappen sist ble skrevet til.

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er uttrykt i lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters defined by the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: path er en tom streng, inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn som er definert av den <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: path is .

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isolerte lageret har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The isolated store has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Isolert butikken er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: -or- Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - deaktiveres isolerte lagring.

trans-unit.source: Obtains machine-scoped isolated storage corresponding to the calling code's application identity.
trans-unit.target: Henter maskinen område isolert lagring tilsvarer kall kodens tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: All assemblies associated with an application use the same isolated store when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Alle samlinger som er knyttet til et program bruker samme isolert lager ved bruk av denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: GetMachineStoreForApplication is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cs[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.cpp)]
trans-unit.target: GetMachineStoreForApplication tilsvarer Funksjonsmessig følgende kode: [!code-cs [System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.vb)][!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#18 ](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_5_1.cpp)]

trans-unit.source: An object corresponding to the isolated storage scope based on the calling code's application identity.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som tilsvarer isolert lagring omfanget basert på kall kodens tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: The application identity of the caller could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteprogramidentiteten oppkallerens kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.source: -or- The granted permission set for the application domain could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tillatelsessettet gitt for programdomenet kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.source: -or- An isolated storage location cannot be initialized.
trans-unit.target: - eller - kan ikke initialisere en isolert lagringsplass.

trans-unit.source: Sufficient isolated storage permissions have not been granted.
trans-unit.target: Har ikke fått tilstrekkelige tillatelser for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: Obtains machine-scoped isolated storage corresponding to the calling code's assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: Henter maskinen område isolert lagring tilsvarer kall koden samlingsidentitet.

trans-unit.source: The same assembly within different applications always uses the same isolated store when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Samme samlingen i ulike applikasjoner alltid bruker samme isolert lager ved bruk av denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: GetMachineStoreForAssembly is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cs[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.cpp)] > [!NOTE] > Different assemblies running within the same application domain always have distinct isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: GetMachineStoreForAssembly tilsvarer Funksjonsmessig følgende kode: [!code-cs [System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.vb)][!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#19](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_12_1.cpp) ] > [!NOTE] > annen samlinger som kjører i samme programdomene alltid har ulike isolerte butikker.

trans-unit.source: An object corresponding to the isolated storage scope based on the calling code's assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som tilsvarer isolert lagring omfanget basert på kall koden samlingsidentitet.

trans-unit.source: An isolated storage location cannot be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke initialisere en isolert lagringsplass.

trans-unit.source: Sufficient isolated storage permissions have not been granted.
trans-unit.target: Har ikke fått tilstrekkelige tillatelser for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: Obtains machine-scoped isolated storage corresponding to the application domain identity and the assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: Henter maskinen område isolert lagring tilsvarer tjenesteprogramidentiteten for domain og samlingsidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: The same assembly code will use different isolated stores when used in the context of different applications.
trans-unit.target: Den samme samling koden bruker forskjellige isolerte butikker når den brukes i konteksten for ulike applikasjoner.

trans-unit.source: GetMachineStoreForDomain is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cs[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.cpp)] Different assemblies running within the same application domain always have distinct isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: GetMachineStoreForDomain tilsvarer Funksjonsmessig følgende kode: [!code-cs [System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.vb)][!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#20](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.io.isolatedstor_0_1.cpp) ] annen samlinger som kjører i samme programdomene alltid har ulike isolerte butikker.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain%2A> will return an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object without a quota if the application domain into which the assembly is installed does not have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain%2A>kommer til å returnere et <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objekt uten en kvote Hvis programdomenet samlingen er installert som ikke har <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForDomain%2A>

trans-unit.source: Later attempts to create an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object that does not have a quota will fail with an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.
trans-unit.target: Senere forsøk på å opprette et <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objekt som bruker <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objektet som ikke har en kvote mislykkes med en <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: An object corresponding to the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope"></xref>, based on a combination of the application domain identity and the assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: En objektet samsvarer med den <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope"> </xref>, basert på en kombinasjon av domene tjenesteprogramidentiteten og samlingsidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: Sufficient isolated storage permissions have not been granted.
trans-unit.target: Har ikke fått tilstrekkelige tillatelser for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The store failed to open.
trans-unit.target: Kunne ikke åpne lageret.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assembly specified has insufficient permissions to create isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: - eller - samlingen som er angitt, har ikke tilstrekkelige tillatelser til å opprette isolerte butikker.

trans-unit.source: -or- The permissions for the application domain cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tillatelser for programdomenet kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.source: -or- An isolated storage location cannot be initialized.
trans-unit.target: - eller - kan ikke initialisere en isolert lagringsplass.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Obtains isolated storage corresponding to the given application identity.
trans-unit.target: Henter isolert lagring som tilsvarer den angitte tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier for opplisting.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains evidence for the application identity.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder bevis for ID..

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the parameters.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer parameterne.

trans-unit.source: Sufficient isolated storage permissions have not been granted.
trans-unit.target: Har ikke fått tilstrekkelige tillatelser for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: The applicationIdentity identity has not been passed in.
trans-unit.target: Den applicationIdentity identitet er ikke sendt i.

trans-unit.source: The scope is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Den scope er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: An isolated storage location cannot be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke initialisere en isolert lagringsplass.

trans-unit.source: -or- scope contains the enumeration value , but the application identity of the caller cannot be determined,because the for the current application domain returned .
trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder opplistingsverdien , men tjenesteprogramidentiteten oppkallerens kan ikke fastslås fordi den for gjeldende programdomenet returnerte .

trans-unit.source: -or- scope contains the value , but the permissions for the application domain cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder verdien , men tillatelsene for programdomenet kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.source: -or- scope contains the value , but the permissions for the calling assembly cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder verdien , men tillatelsene for å samlingen kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.source: Obtains isolated storage corresponding to the isolation scope and the application identity object.
trans-unit.target: Henter isolert lagring tilsvarer omfanget isolasjon og identitet applikasjonsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `scope` parameter is <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope> and the application domain in which the assembly is installed does not have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission>, the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore%2A> method will return an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object without a quota.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Hvis den `scope` parameteren er <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope>og programdomenet samlingen er installert, har ikke <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore%2A>metoden tilbakestiller en <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objektet noen grense.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageFilePermission> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageScope>

trans-unit.source: Later attempts to create an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object using the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object that does not have a quota will fail with an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.
trans-unit.target: Senere forsøk på å opprette et <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objekt som bruker <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>objektet som ikke har en kvote mislykkes med en <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier for opplisting.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the parameters.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer parameterne.

trans-unit.target: Har ikke fått tilstrekkelige tillatelser for isolert lagring.

trans-unit.source: An isolated storage location cannot be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke initialisere en isolert lagringsplass.

trans-unit.source: -or- scope contains the enumeration value , but the application identity of the caller cannot be determined, because the for the current application domain returned .
trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder opplistingsverdien , men tjenesteprogramidentiteten oppkallerens kan ikke fastslås fordi den for gjeldende programdomenet returnerte .

trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder verdien , men tillatelsene for programdomenet kan ikke fastslås.

trans-unit.target: - eller - scope inneholder verdien , men tillatelsene for å samlingen kan ikke fastslås.
